descriptions: The humps on Camerupt’s back are formed by a transformation of its bones. They sometimes blast out molten magma. This Pokémon apparently erupts often when it is enraged.
Camerupt has a volcano inside its body. Magma of 18,000 degrees Fahrenheit courses through its body. Occasionally, the humps on this Pokémon’s back erupt, spewing the superheated magma.

abilities.name: Sheer Force
abilities.description: Removes any additional effects from the Pokémon’s moves, but increases the moves’ power.

name: Torkoal
descriptions: Coal is the source of Torkoal’s energy. Large amounts of coal can be found in the mountains where they live.
It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered.

abilities.name: White Smoke
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected by its white smoke, which prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

name: Spoink
descriptions: Using its tail like a spring, it keeps its heart beating by bouncing constantly. If it stops, it dies.
Spoink will die if it stops bouncing. The pearl on its head amplifies its psychic powers.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.description: The Pokémon sticks to its own tempo, preventing it from becoming confused or being affected by Intimidate.

name: Grumpig
descriptions: It uses black pearls to amplify its psychic power. It does a strange dance to control foes’ minds.
It can perform odd dance steps to influence foes. Its style of dancing became hugely popular overseas.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.description: The Pokémon sticks to its own tempo, preventing it from becoming confused or being affected by Intimidate.

name: Spinda
descriptions: Each Spinda’s spot pattern is different. With its stumbling movements, it evades opponents’ attacks brilliantly!
Its steps are shaky and stumbling. Walking for a long time makes it feel sick.

abilities.name: Tangled Feet
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s evasiveness if it is confused.

name: Trapinch
descriptions: It makes an inescapable conical pit and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.
Its nest is a sloped, bowl-like pit in the desert. Once something has fallen in, there is no escape.

abilities.name: Arena Trap
abilities.description: Prevents opposing Pokémon from fleeing from battle.

name: Vibrava
descriptions: To help make its wings grow, it dissolves quantities of prey in its digestive juices and guzzles them down every day.
The ultrasonic waves it generates by rubbing its two wings together cause severe headaches.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Flygon
descriptions: It is nicknamed the Desert Spirit because the flapping of its wings sounds like a woman singing.
This Pokémon hides in the heart of sandstorms it creates and seldom appears where people can see it.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Cacnea
descriptions: It lives in arid locations. Its yellow flowers bloom once a year.
It prefers harsh environments, such as deserts. It can survive for 30 days on water stored in its body.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s evasiveness in a sandstorm.

name: Cacturne
descriptions: It lives in deserts. It becomes active at night when it hunts for prey exhausted from the desert’s heat.
Packs of them follow travelers through the desert until the travelers can no longer move.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s evasiveness in a sandstorm.

name: Swablu
descriptions: It can’t relax if it or its surroundings are not clean. It wipes off dirt with its wings.
It constantly grooms its cotton-like wings. It takes a shower to clean itself if it becomes dirty.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.description: The Pokémon’s status conditions are cured when it switches out.

name: Altaria
descriptions: On sunny days, it flies freely through the sky and blends into the clouds. It sings in a beautiful soprano.
If it bonds with a person, it will gently envelop the friend with its soft wings, then hum.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.description: The Pokémon’s status conditions are cured when it switches out.

name: Mega Altaria
descriptions: Altaria sings in a gorgeous soprano. Its wings are like cotton clouds. This Pokémon catches updrafts with its buoyant wings and soars way up into the wild blue yonder.
Altaria dances and wheels through the sky among billowing, cotton-like clouds. By singing melodies in its crystal-clear voice, this Pokémon makes its listeners experience dreamy wonderment.

abilities.name: Pixilate
abilities.description: Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

name: Zangoose
descriptions: If it comes across a Seviper, its fur bristles and it assumes its battle pose. Its sharp claws are its best weapon.
It’s Seviper’s archrival. To threaten those it encounters, it fans out the claws on its front paws.

abilities.name: Immunity
abilities.description: The Pokémon’s immune system prevents it from being poisoned.

name: Seviper
descriptions: Constant polishing makes the edge of the blade on its tail extremely sharp. It’s Zangoose’s archrival.
It sharpens its swordlike tail on hard rocks. It hides in tall grass and strikes unwary prey with venomous fangs.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: The Pokémon may cure its own status conditions by shedding its skin.

name: Lunatone
descriptions: It was discovered at the site of a meteor strike 40 years ago. Its stare can lull its foes to sleep.
The phase of the moon apparently has some effect on its power. It’s active on the night of a full moon.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Solrock
descriptions: Solar energy is the source of its power, so it is strong during the daytime. When it spins, its body shines.
When it rotates itself, it gives off light similar to the sun, thus blinding its foes.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Barboach
descriptions: It probes muddy riverbeds with its two long whiskers. A slimy film protects its body.
Its two whiskers provide a sensitive radar. Even in muddy waters, it can detect its prey’s location.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: The Pokémon is oblivious, keeping it from being infatuated, falling for taunts, or being affected by Intimidate.

name: Whiscash
descriptions: Sighting Whiscash leaping from the water is believed to herald an earthquake.
It is extremely protective of its territory. If any foe approaches, it attacks using vicious tremors.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: The Pokémon is oblivious, keeping it from being infatuated, falling for taunts, or being affected by Intimidate.

name: Corphish
descriptions: It was originally a Pokémon from afar that escaped to the wild. It can adapt to the dirtiest river.
No matter how dirty the water in the river, it will adapt and thrive. It has a strong will to survive.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: A hard shell protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

name: Crawdaunt
descriptions: A brutish Pokémon that loves to battle. It will crash itself into any foe that approaches its nest.
A rough customer that wildly flails its giant claws. It is said to be extremely hard to raise.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: A hard shell protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

name: Baltoy
descriptions: It was discovered in ancient ruins. While moving, it constantly spins. It stands on one foot even when asleep.
It moves while spinning around on its single foot. Some Baltoy have been seen spinning on their heads.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Claydol
descriptions: It appears to have been born from clay dolls made by ancient people. It uses telekinesis to float and move.
This mysterious Pokémon started life as an ancient clay figurine made over 20,000 years ago.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Lileep
descriptions: Lileep clings to rocks on the seabed. When prey comes close, this Pokémon entangles it with petallike tentacles.
This Pokémon was restored from a fossil. Lileep once lived in warm seas that existed approximately 100,000,000 years ago.

abilities.name: Suction Cups
abilities.description: The Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot. This protects it from moves and items that would force it to switch out.

name: Cradily
descriptions: Once Cradily catches prey in its tentacles, it digests them whole and absorbs their nutrients.
It has short legs and can’t walk very fast, but its neck and tentacles can extend to over three times their usual length to nab distant prey.

abilities.name: Suction Cups
abilities.description: The Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot. This protects it from moves and items that would force it to switch out.

name: Anorith
descriptions: Anorith can swim swiftly by pulling its eight wings through the water like oars on a boat. This Pokémon is an ancestor of modern bug Pokémon.
This Pokémon was restored from a fossil. Anorith lived in the ocean about 100,000,000 years ago, hunting with its pair of claws.

abilities.name: Battle Armor
abilities.description: Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

name: Armaldo
descriptions: Though it lives on land, it’s also a good swimmer. It dives into the ocean in search of prey, using its sharp claws to take down its quarry.
After evolution, this Pokémon emerged onto land. Its lower body has become stronger, and blows from its tail are devastating.

abilities.name: Battle Armor
abilities.description: Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

name: Feebas
descriptions: It is a shabby and ugly Pokémon. However, it is very hardy and can survive on little water.
Although unattractive and unpopular, this Pokémon’s marvelous vitality has made it a subject of research.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: The Pokémon is oblivious, keeping it from being infatuated, falling for taunts, or being affected by Intimidate.

name: Milotic
descriptions: It’s said that a glimpse of a Milotic and its beauty will calm any hostile emotions you’re feeling.
Milotic has provided inspiration to many artists. It has even been referred to as the most beautiful Pokémon of all.

abilities.name: Marvel Scale
abilities.description: The Pokémon’s marvelous scales boost its Defense stat if it has a status condition.

name: Castform
descriptions: Its form changes depending on the weather. The rougher conditions get, the rougher Castform’s disposition!
Although its form changes with the weather, that is apparently the result of a chemical reaction and not the result of its own free will.

abilities.name: Forecast
abilities.description: The Pokémon transforms with the weather to change its type to Water, Fire, or Ice.

name: Kecleon
descriptions: Its color changes for concealment and also when its mood or health changes. The darker the color, the healthier it is.
It changes its hue to blend into its surroundings. If no one takes notice of it for too long, it will pout and never reveal itself.

abilities.name: Color Change
abilities.description: The Pokémon’s type becomes the type of the move used on it.

name: Shuppet
descriptions: It feeds on the dark emotions of sadness and hatred, which make it grow steadily stronger.
It loves to feed on feelings like envy and malice. Its upright horn catches the emotions of people.

abilities.name: Insomnia
abilities.description: The Pokémon’s insomnia prevents it from falling asleep.

name: Banette
descriptions: Strong feelings of hatred turned a puppet into a Pokémon. If it opens its mouth, its cursed energy escapes.
This Pokémon developed from an abandoned doll that amassed a grudge. It is seen in dark alleys.

abilities.name: Insomnia
abilities.description: The Pokémon’s insomnia prevents it from falling asleep.

name: Mega Banette
descriptions: Mega Evolution increases its vindictiveness, and the cursing power that was held back by its zipper comes spilling out.
Extraordinary energy amplifies its cursing power to such an extent that it can’t help but curse its own Trainer.

abilities.name: Prankster
abilities.description: Gives priority to the Pokémon’s status moves.

name: Duskull
descriptions: Making itself invisible, it silently sneaks up to prey. It has the ability to slip through thick walls.
If it finds bad children who won’t listen to their parents, it will spirit them away—or so it’s said.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Dusclops
descriptions: It seeks drifting will-o’-the-wisps and sucks them into its empty body. What happens inside is a mystery.
Its body is entirely hollow. When it opens its mouth, it sucks everything in as if it were a black hole.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: Puts other Pokémon under pressure, causing them to expend more PP to use their moves.

name: Tropius
descriptions: Delicious fruits grew out from around its neck because it always ate the same kind of fruit.
It lives in tropical jungles. The bunch of fruit around its neck is delicious. The fruit grows twice a year.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in harsh sunlight.

name: Chimecho
descriptions: In high winds, Chimecho cries as it hangs from a tree branch or the eaves of a building using a suction cup on its head. This Pokémon plucks berries with its long tail and eats them.
Chimecho makes its cries echo inside its hollow body. When this Pokémon becomes enraged, its cries result in ultrasonic waves that have the power to knock foes flying.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Absol
descriptions: Because of this Pokémon’s ability to detect danger, people mistook Absol as a bringer of doom.
Swift as the wind, Absol races through fields and mountains. Its curved, bow-like horn is acutely sensitive to the warning signs of natural disasters.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: Puts other Pokémon under pressure, causing them to expend more PP to use their moves.

name: Mega Absol
descriptions: It converts the energy from Mega Evolution into an intimidating aura. Fainthearted people expire from shock at the sight of it.
Normally, it dislikes fighting, so it really hates changing to this form for battles.

abilities.name: Magic Bounce
abilities.description: The Pokémon reflects status moves instead of getting hit by them.

name: Wynaut
descriptions: It tends to move in a pack with others. They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.
It tends to move in a pack. Individuals squash against one another to toughen their spirits.

abilities.name: Shadow Tag
abilities.description: The Pokémon steps on the opposing Pokémon’s shadows to prevent them from fleeing or switching out.

name: Snorunt
descriptions: It is said that a home visited by a Snorunt will prosper. It can withstand cold of −150 degrees Fahrenheit.
It is said that several Snorunt gather under giant leaves and live together in harmony.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: The Pokémon’s intense focus prevents it from flinching or being affected by Intimidate.

name: Glalie
descriptions: It prevents prey from escaping by instantaneously freezing moisture in the air.
Its prey is instantaneously frozen stiff by the cold air it exhales from its huge mouth. While they’re in that frozen state, it gobbles them up.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: The Pokémon’s intense focus prevents it from flinching or being affected by Intimidate.

name: Mega Glalie
descriptions: The power of Mega Evolution was so strong that it smashed Glalie’s jaw. Its inability to eat very well leaves Glalie irritated.
When it spews stupendously cold air from its broken mouth, the entire area around it gets whited out.

abilities.name: Refrigerate
abilities.description: Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

name: Spheal
descriptions: As it drifts among the waves, Spheal probes the sea. As soon as it spots prey, it informs the Walrein in its herd.
This Pokémon’s body is covered in blubber and impressively round. It’s faster for Spheal to roll around than walk.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected by a layer of thick fat, which halves the damage taken from Fire- and Ice-type moves.

name: Sealeo
descriptions: This Pokémon has a habit of spinning round things on its nose, whether those things are Poké Balls or Spheal.
Sealeo live on top of drift ice. They go swimming when they’re on the hunt, seeking out their prey by scent.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected by a layer of thick fat, which halves the damage taken from Fire- and Ice-type moves.

name: Walrein
descriptions: Walrein’s tusks keep growing throughout its life. Tusks broken in battle will grow back to their usual impressive size in a year.
Walrein form herds of 20 to 30 individuals. When a threat appears, the herd’s leader will protect the group with its life.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected by a layer of thick fat, which halves the damage taken from Fire- and Ice-type moves.

name: Clamperl
descriptions: Clamperl’s pearls are exceedingly precious. They can be more than 10 times as costly as Shellder’s pearls.
Despite its appearance, it’s carnivorous. It clamps down on its prey with both sides of its shell and doesn’t let go until they stop moving.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: A hard shell protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

name: Huntail
descriptions: Deep seas are their habitat. According to tradition, when Huntail wash up onshore, something unfortunate will happen.
It’s not the strongest swimmer. It wags its tail to lure in its prey and then gulps them down as soon as they get close.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in rain.

name: Gorebyss
descriptions: It sucks bodily fluids out of its prey. The leftover meat sinks to the seafloor, where it becomes food for other Pokémon.
The color of its body changes with the water temperature. The coloration of Gorebyss in Alola is almost blindingly vivid.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in rain.

name: Relicanth
descriptions: This Pokémon was discovered during deep-sea exploration. Its appearance hasn’t changed in 100,000,000 years, so it’s called a living fossil.
Rock-hard scales and oil-filled swim bladders allow this Pokémon to survive the intense water pressure of the deep sea.

abilities.name: Rock Head
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

name: Luvdisc
descriptions: During the spawning season, countless Luvdisc congregate at coral reefs, turning the waters pink.
Its heart-shaped body makes it popular. In some places, you would give a Luvdisc to someone you love.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in rain.

name: Bagon
descriptions: Its belief that it will be able to fly one day is apparently the influence of information carried in its genes.
Its steel-hard head can shatter boulders. It longingly hopes for wings to grow so it can fly.

abilities.name: Rock Head
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

name: Shelgon
descriptions: Its armored body makes all attacks bounce off. The armor is too tough, however, making it heavy and somewhat sluggish.
The cells within its shell transform with explosive speed, preparing it for evolution.

abilities.name: Rock Head
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

name: Salamence
descriptions: It becomes uncontrollable if it is enraged. It destroys everything with shredding claws and fire.
It flies around on its wings, which have grown in at last. In its happiness, it gushes hot flames, burning up everything it passes over.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it intimidates opposing Pokémon and makes them cower, lowering their Attack stats.

name: Mega Salamence
descriptions: It puts its forelegs inside its shell to streamline itself for flight. Salamence flies at high speeds over all kinds of topographical features.
The stress of its two proud wings becoming misshapen and stuck together because of strong energy makes it go on a rampage.

abilities.name: Aerilate
abilities.description: Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

name: Beldum
descriptions: The cells in this Pokémon’s body are composed of magnetic material. Instead of blood, magnetic forces flow through Beldum’s body.
From its rear, Beldum emits a magnetic force that rapidly pulls opponents in. They get skewered on Beldum’s sharp claws.

abilities.name: Clear Body
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon’s moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon’s stats.

name: Metang
descriptions: Using magnetic forces to stay aloft, this Pokémon flies at high speeds, weaving through harsh mountain terrain in pursuit of prey.
Two Beldum have become stuck together via their own magnetic forces. With two brains, the resulting Metang has doubled psychic powers.

abilities.name: Clear Body
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon’s moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon’s stats.

name: Metagross
descriptions: Metagross is the result of the fusion of two Metang. This Pokémon defeats its opponents through use of its supercomputer-level brain.
Because the magnetic powers of these Pokémon get stronger in freezing temperatures, Metagross living on snowy mountains are full of energy.

abilities.name: Clear Body
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon’s moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon’s stats.

name: Mega Metagross
descriptions: When it knows it can’t win, it digs the claws on its legs into its opponent and starts the countdown to a big explosion.
Its intellect surpasses its previous level, resulting in battles so cruel, they’ll make you want to cover your eyes.

abilities.name: Tough Claws
abilities.description: Powers up moves that make direct contact.

name: Regirock
descriptions: Cutting-edge technology was used to study the internals of this Pokémon’s rock body, but nothing was found—not even a brain or a heart.
Every bit of Regirock’s body is made of stone. As parts of its body erode, this Pokémon sticks rocks to itself to repair what’s been lost.

abilities.name: Clear Body
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon’s moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon’s stats.

name: Regice
descriptions: This Pokémon’s body is made of solid ice. It’s said that Regice was born beneath thick ice in the ice age.
With cold air that can reach temperatures as low as −328 degrees Fahrenheit, Regice instantly freezes any creature that approaches it.

abilities.name: Clear Body
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon’s moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon’s stats.

name: Registeel
descriptions: It’s rumored that this Pokémon was born deep underground in the planet’s mantle and that it emerged onto the surface 10,000 years ago.
Registeel’s body is made of a strange material that is flexible enough to stretch and shrink but also more durable than any metal.

abilities.name: Clear Body
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon’s moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon’s stats.

name: Latias
descriptions: Latias is highly intelligent and capable of understanding human speech. It is covered with a glass-like down. The Pokémon enfolds its body with its down and refracts light to alter its appearance.
Latias is highly sensitive to the emotions of people. If it senses any hostility, this Pokémon ruffles the feathers all over its body and cries shrilly to intimidate the foe.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Mega Latias
descriptions: Latias is highly intelligent and capable of understanding human speech. It is covered with a glass-like down. The Pokémon enfolds its body with its down and refracts light to alter its appearance.
Latias is highly sensitive to the emotions of people. If it senses any hostility, this Pokémon ruffles the feathers all over its body and cries shrilly to intimidate the foe.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Latios
descriptions: Latios will only open its heart to a Trainer with a compassionate spirit. This Pokémon can fly faster than a jet plane by folding its forelegs to minimize air resistance.
Latios has the ability to make others see an image of what it has seen or imagines in its head. This Pokémon is intelligent and understands human speech.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Mega Latios
descriptions: Latios will only open its heart to a Trainer with a compassionate spirit. This Pokémon can fly faster than a jet plane by folding its forelegs to minimize air resistance.
Latios has the ability to make others see an image of what it has seen or imagines in its head. This Pokémon is intelligent and understands human speech.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Kyogre
descriptions: Kyogre is said to be the personification of the sea itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Groudon, as each sought to gain the power of nature.
Through Primal Reversion and with nature’s full power, it will take back its true form. It can summon storms that cause the sea levels to rise.

abilities.name: Drizzle
abilities.description: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

name: Primal Reversion
descriptions: Kyogre is said to be the personification of the sea itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Groudon, as each sought to gain the power of nature.
Through Primal Reversion and with nature’s full power, it will take back its true form. It can summon storms that cause the sea levels to rise.

abilities.name: Primordial Sea
abilities.description: The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify Fire-type attacks.

name: Groudon
descriptions: Through Primal Reversion and with nature’s full power, it will take back its true form. It can cause magma to erupt and expand the landmass of the world.
Groudon is said to be the personification of the land itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Kyogre, as each sought to gain the power of nature.

abilities.name: Drought
abilities.description: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.

name: Primal Reversion
descriptions: Through Primal Reversion and with nature’s full power, it will take back its true form. It can cause magma to erupt and expand the landmass of the world.
Groudon is said to be the personification of the land itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Kyogre, as each sought to gain the power of nature.

abilities.name: Desolate Land
abilities.description: The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify Water-type attacks.

name: Rayquaza
descriptions: It flies forever through the ozone layer, consuming meteoroids for sustenance. The many meteoroids in its body provide the energy it needs to Mega Evolve.
Rayquaza is said to have lived for hundreds of millions of years. Legends remain of how it put to rest the clash between Kyogre and Groudon.

abilities.name: Air Lock
abilities.description: Eliminates the effects of weather.

name: Mega Rayquaza
descriptions: It flies forever through the ozone layer, consuming meteoroids for sustenance. The many meteoroids in its body provide the energy it needs to Mega Evolve.
Rayquaza is said to have lived for hundreds of millions of years. Legends remain of how it put to rest the clash between Kyogre and Groudon.

abilities.name: Delta Stream
abilities.description: The Pokémon changes the weather so that no moves are super effective against the Flying type.

name: Jirachi
descriptions: Jirachi will awaken from its sleep of a thousand years if you sing to it in a voice of purity. It is said to make true any wish that people desire.
A legend states that Jirachi will make true any wish that is written on notes attached to its head when it awakens. If this Pokémon senses danger, it will fight without awakening.

abilities.name: Serene Grace
abilities.description: Raises the likelihood of additional effects occurring when the Pokémon uses its moves.

name: Normal Forme
descriptions: Deoxys emerged from a virus that came from space. It is highly intelligent and wields psychokinetic powers. This Pokémon shoots lasers from the crystalline organ on its chest.
The DNA of a space virus underwent a sudden mutation upon exposure to a laser beam and resulted in Deoxys. The crystalline organ on this Pokémon’s chest appears to be its brain.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: Puts other Pokémon under pressure, causing them to expend more PP to use their moves.

name: Attack Forme
descriptions: Deoxys emerged from a virus that came from space. It is highly intelligent and wields psychokinetic powers. This Pokémon shoots lasers from the crystalline organ on its chest.
The DNA of a space virus underwent a sudden mutation upon exposure to a laser beam and resulted in Deoxys. The crystalline organ on this Pokémon’s chest appears to be its brain.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: Puts other Pokémon under pressure, causing them to expend more PP to use their moves.

name: Defense Forme
descriptions: Deoxys emerged from a virus that came from space. It is highly intelligent and wields psychokinetic powers. This Pokémon shoots lasers from the crystalline organ on its chest.
The DNA of a space virus underwent a sudden mutation upon exposure to a laser beam and resulted in Deoxys. The crystalline organ on this Pokémon’s chest appears to be its brain.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: Puts other Pokémon under pressure, causing them to expend more PP to use their moves.

name: Speed Forme
descriptions: Deoxys emerged from a virus that came from space. It is highly intelligent and wields psychokinetic powers. This Pokémon shoots lasers from the crystalline organ on its chest.
The DNA of a space virus underwent a sudden mutation upon exposure to a laser beam and resulted in Deoxys. The crystalline organ on this Pokémon’s chest appears to be its brain.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: Puts other Pokémon under pressure, causing them to expend more PP to use their moves.

name: Turtwig
descriptions: It undertakes photosynthesis with its body, making oxygen. The leaf on its head wilts if it is thirsty.
Photosynthesis occurs across its body under the sun. The shell on its back is actually hardened soil.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.description: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

name: Grotle
descriptions: It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow Pokémon there on its back.
It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.description: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

name: Torterra
descriptions: Small Pokémon occasionally gather on its unmoving back to begin building their nests.
Ancient people imagined that beneath the ground, a gigantic Torterra dwelled.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.description: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

name: Chimchar
descriptions: The gas made in its belly burns from its rear end. The fire burns weakly when it feels sick.
Its fiery rear end is fueled by gas made in its belly. Even rain can’t extinguish the fire.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

name: Monferno
descriptions: It uses ceilings and walls to launch aerial attacks. Its fiery tail is but one weapon.
It skillfully controls the intensity of the fire on its tail to keep its foes at an ideal distance.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

name: Infernape
descriptions: It tosses its enemies around with agility. It uses all its limbs to fight in its own unique style.
Its crown of fire is indicative of its fiery nature. It is beaten by none in terms of quickness.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

name: Piplup
descriptions: Because it is very proud, it hates accepting food from people. Its thick down guards it from cold.
It doesn’t like to be taken care of. It’s difficult to bond with since it won’t listen to its Trainer.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

name: Prinplup
descriptions: It lives a solitary life. Its wings deliver wicked blows that can snap even the thickest of trees.
It lives alone, away from others. Apparently, every one of them believes it is the most important.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

name: Empoleon
descriptions: The three horns that extend from its beak attest to its power. The leader has the biggest horns.
It swims as fast as a jet boat. The edges of its wings are sharp and can slice apart drifting ice.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

name: Starly
descriptions: Because they are weak individually, they form groups. However, they bicker if the group grows too big.
They flock around mountains and fields, chasing after bug Pokémon. Their singing is noisy and annoying.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: The Pokémon’s keen eyes prevent its accuracy from being lowered.

name: Staravia
descriptions: They maintain huge flocks, although fierce scuffles break out between various flocks.
Recognizing their own weakness, they always live in a group. When alone, a Staravia cries noisily.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it intimidates opposing Pokémon and makes them cower, lowering their Attack stats.

name: Staraptor
descriptions: It never stops attacking even if it is injured. It fusses over the shape of its comb.
When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it intimidates opposing Pokémon and makes them cower, lowering their Attack stats.

name: Bidoof
descriptions: It constantly gnaws on logs and rocks to whittle down its front teeth. It nests alongside water.
With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.

abilities.name: Simple
abilities.description: Doubles the effects of the Pokémon’s stat changes.

name: Bibarel
descriptions: It makes its nest by damming streams with bark and mud. It is known as an industrious worker.
It busily makes its nest with stacks of branches and roots it has cut up with its sharp incisors.

abilities.name: Simple
abilities.description: Doubles the effects of the Pokémon’s stat changes.

name: Kricketot
descriptions: When its antennae hit each other, it sounds like the music of a xylophone.
Its legs are short. Whenever it stumbles, its stiff antennae clack with a xylophone-like sound.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: The Pokémon may cure its own status conditions by shedding its skin.

name: Kricketune
descriptions: There is a village that hosts a contest based on the amazingly variable cries of this Pokémon.
By allowing its cry to resonate in the hollow of its belly, it produces a captivating sound.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

name: Shinx
descriptions: The extension and contraction of its muscles generates electricity. Its fur glows when it’s in trouble.
The extension and contraction of its muscles generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it intimidates opposing Pokémon and makes them cower, lowering their Attack stats.

name: Luxio
descriptions: By gathering their tails together, they collectively generate powerful electricity from their claws.
Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it intimidates opposing Pokémon and makes them cower, lowering their Attack stats.

name: Luxray
descriptions: Luxray’s ability to see through objects comes in handy when it’s scouting for danger.
It can see clearly through walls to track down its prey and seek its lost young.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it intimidates opposing Pokémon and makes them cower, lowering their Attack stats.

name: Budew
descriptions: This Pokémon is highly sensitive to temperature changes. When its bud starts to open, that means spring is right around the corner.
The pollen it releases contains poison. If this Pokémon is raised on clean water, the poison’s toxicity is increased.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

name: Roserade
descriptions: The poison in its right hand is quick acting. The poison in its left hand is slow acting. Both are life threatening.
After captivating opponents with its sweet scent, it lashes them with its thorny whips.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

name: Cranidos
descriptions: Its hard skull is its distinguishing feature. It snapped trees by headbutting them, and then it fed on their ripe berries.
A primeval Pokémon, it possesses a hard and sturdy skull, lacking any intelligence within.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.description: The Pokémon’s moves are unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

name: Rampardos
descriptions: This ancient Pokémon used headbutts skillfully. Its brain was really small, so some theories suggest that its stupidity led to its extinction.
In ancient times, people would dig up fossils of this Pokémon and use its skull, which is harder than steel, to make helmets.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.description: The Pokémon’s moves are unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

name: Shieldon
descriptions: Although its fossils can be found in layers of primeval rock, nothing but its face has ever been discovered.
A mild-mannered, herbivorous Pokémon, it used its face to dig up tree roots to eat. The skin on its face was plenty tough.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.description: The Pokémon cannot be knocked out by a single hit as long as its HP is full. One-hit KO moves will also fail to knock it out.

name: Bastiodon
descriptions: This Pokémon is from roughly 100 million years ago. Its terrifyingly tough face is harder than steel.
The bones of its face are huge and hard, so they were mistaken for its spine until after this Pokémon was successfully restored.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.description: The Pokémon cannot be knocked out by a single hit as long as its HP is full. One-hit KO moves will also fail to knock it out.

name: Plant Cloak
descriptions: If its cloak is broken in battle, it quickly remakes the cloak with materials nearby.
To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: The Pokémon may cure its own status conditions by shedding its skin.

name: Sandy Cloak
descriptions: If its cloak is broken in battle, it quickly remakes the cloak with materials nearby.
To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: The Pokémon may cure its own status conditions by shedding its skin.

name: Trash Cloak
descriptions: If its cloak is broken in battle, it quickly remakes the cloak with materials nearby.
To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: The Pokémon may cure its own status conditions by shedding its skin.

name: Plant Cloak
descriptions: When Burmy evolved, its cloak became a part of this Pokémon’s body. The cloak is never shed.
Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.description: The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon’s dangerous moves.

name: Sandy Cloak
descriptions: When Burmy evolved, its cloak became a part of this Pokémon’s body. The cloak is never shed.
Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.description: The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon’s dangerous moves.

name: Trash Cloak
descriptions: When Burmy evolved, its cloak became a part of this Pokémon’s body. The cloak is never shed.
Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.description: The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon’s dangerous moves.

name: Mothim
descriptions: It flutters around at night and steals honey from the Combee hive.
It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey collected by Combee.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

name: Combee
descriptions: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers nectar from flowers to please Vespiquen.
At night, Combee sleep in a group of about a hundred, packed closely together in a lump.

abilities.name: Honey Gather
abilities.description: The Pokémon may gather Honey after a battle.

name: Vespiquen
descriptions: It raises grubs in the holes in its body. It secretes pheromones to control Combee.
It houses its colony in cells in its body and releases various pheromones to make those grubs do its bidding.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: Puts other Pokémon under pressure, causing them to expend more PP to use their moves.

name: Pachirisu
descriptions: A pair may be seen rubbing their cheek pouches together in an effort to share stored electricity.
It’s one of the kinds of Pokémon with electric cheek pouches. It shoots charges from its tail.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

name: Buizel
descriptions: It inflates its flotation sac, keeping its face above water in order to watch for prey movement.
It spins its two tails like a screw to propel itself through water. The tails also slice clinging seaweed.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in rain.

name: Floatzel
descriptions: It is a common sight around fishing ports. It is known to rescue people and help fishers carry what they caught.
With its flotation sac inflated, it can carry people on its back. It deflates the sac before it dives.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in rain.

name: Cherubi
descriptions: The deeper a Cherubi’s red, the more nutrients it has stockpiled in its body. And the sweeter and tastier its small ball!
It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting pecked by bird Pokémon that would love to make off with its small, nutrient-rich storage ball.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in harsh sunlight.

name: Overcast Form
descriptions: Its folded petals are pretty tough. Bird Pokémon can peck at them all they want, and Cherrim won’t be bothered at all.
As a bud, it barely moves. It sits still, placidly waiting for sunlight to appear.

abilities.name: Flower Gift
abilities.description: Boosts the Attack and Sp. Def stats of the Pokémon and its allies in harsh sunlight.

name: Sunshine Form
descriptions: The faint scent that emanates from its full blossom entices bug Pokémon to it.
After absorbing plenty of sunlight, Cherrim takes this form. It’s full of energy while it’s like this, and its liveliness will go on until sundown.

abilities.name: Flower Gift
abilities.description: Boosts the Attack and Sp. Def stats of the Pokémon and its allies in harsh sunlight.

name: West Sea Shellos
descriptions: It oozes a purple fluid to deter enemies. Apparently, there are more West Sea Shellos now than there were in the past.
It used to have a shell on its back long ago. This species is closely related to Pokémon like Shellder.

abilities.name: Sticky Hold
abilities.description: The Pokémon’s held items cling to its sticky body and cannot be removed by other Pokémon.

name: East Sea Shellos
descriptions: This Pokémon can often be seen along seashores. It’s capable of spending a limited amount of time on land.
A recently published research paper states that this form of Shellos is gradually decreasing in number.

abilities.name: Sticky Hold
abilities.description: The Pokémon’s held items cling to its sticky body and cannot be removed by other Pokémon.

name: West Sea Gastrodon
descriptions: It appears on beaches where the waters are shallow. Once it catches prey, it will slowly melt them with its mucus before slurping them up.
Its whole body is sticky with mucus. In the past, this form of Gastrodon was by far the more numerous one.

abilities.name: Sticky Hold
abilities.description: The Pokémon’s held items cling to its sticky body and cannot be removed by other Pokémon.

name: East Sea Gastrodon
descriptions: Fishers say that they didn’t see many of these Pokémon in the past, but this form of Gastrodon is now increasing in number.
They normally inhabit rocky seashores, but in times of continuous rain, they can sometimes be found in the mountains, far from the sea.

abilities.name: Sticky Hold
abilities.description: The Pokémon’s held items cling to its sticky body and cannot be removed by other Pokémon.

name: Ambipom
descriptions: It uses its tails for everything. If it wraps both of its tails around you and gives you a squeeze, that’s proof it really likes you.
In their search for comfortable trees, they get into territorial disputes with groups of Passimian. They win about half the time.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.description: The Pokémon may pick up an item another Pokémon used during a battle. It may pick up items outside of battle, too.

name: Drifloon
descriptions: Because of the way it floats aimlessly, an old folktale calls it a “signpost for wandering spirits.”
It is whispered that any child who mistakes Drifloon for a balloon and holds on to it could wind up missing.

abilities.name: Aftermath
abilities.description: Damages the attacker if it knocks out the Pokémon with a move that makes direct contact.

name: Drifblim
descriptions: They carry people and Pokémon, but the wind can catch them, so there can’t be a fixed destination.
It can generate and release gas within its body. That’s how it can control the altitude of its drift.

abilities.name: Aftermath
abilities.description: Damages the attacker if it knocks out the Pokémon with a move that makes direct contact.

name: Buneary
descriptions: Buneary can attack by rolling up their ears and then striking with the force created by unrolling them. This attack becomes stronger with training.
If both of Buneary’s ears are rolled up, something is wrong with its body or mind. It’s a sure sign the Pokémon is in need of care.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

name: Lopunny
descriptions: Once hot seasons are over, Lopunny’s coat will be replaced with fur that holds a lot of insulating air in preparation for colder weather.
Lopunny is constantly monitoring its surroundings. If danger approaches, this Pokémon responds with superdestructive kicks.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.description: The Pokémon may infatuate attackers that make direct contact with it.

name: Mega Lopunny
descriptions: Mega Evolution awakens its combative instincts. It has shed any fur that got in the way of its attacks.
It swings its ears like whips and strikes its enemies with them. It has an intensely combative disposition.

abilities.name: Scrappy
abilities.description: The Pokémon can hit Ghost-type Pokémon with Normal- and Fighting-type moves. It is also unaffected by Intimidate.

name: Mismagius
descriptions: Its cries sound like incantations to torment the foe. It appears where you least expect it.
Its cry sounds like an incantation. It is said the cry may rarely be imbued with happiness-giving power.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Honchkrow
descriptions: A single cry from this nocturnal Pokémon, and more than 100 of its Murkrow cronies will assemble.
It is merciless by nature. It is said that it never forgives the mistakes of its Murkrow followers.

abilities.name: Insomnia
abilities.description: The Pokémon’s insomnia prevents it from falling asleep.

name: Glameow
descriptions: When it’s happy, Glameow demonstrates beautiful movements of its tail, like a dancing ribbon.
It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.description: The Pokémon’s limber body prevents it from being paralyzed.

name: Purugly
descriptions: To make itself appear intimidatingly beefy, it tightly cinches its waist with its twin tails.
It would claim another Pokémon’s nest as its own if it finds a nest sufficiently comfortable.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.description: The Pokémon sticks to its own tempo, preventing it from becoming confused or being affected by Intimidate.

name: Chingling
descriptions: There is an orb inside its mouth. When it hops, the orb bounces all over and makes a ringing sound.
Each time it hops, it makes a ringing sound. It deafens foes by emitting high-frequency cries.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Stunky
descriptions: The foul fluid from its rear is so revolting that it can make people feel queasy up to a mile and a quarter away.
It sprays a foul fluid from its rear. Its stench spreads over a mile radius, driving Pokémon away.

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.description: By releasing a stench when attacking, the Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.

name: Skuntank
descriptions: It attacks by spraying a repugnant fluid from its tail, but the stench dulls after a few squirts.
It attacks by spraying a horribly smelly fluid from the tip of its tail. Attacks from above confound it.

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.description: By releasing a stench when attacking, the Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.

name: Bronzor
descriptions: They are found in ancient tombs. The patterns on their backs are said to be imbued with mysterious power.
Ancient people believed that the pattern on Bronzor’s back contained a mysterious power.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Bronzong
descriptions: It brought rains by opening portals to another world. It was revered as a bringer of plentiful harvests.
In ages past, this Pokémon was revered as a bringer of rain. It was found buried in the ground.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Bonsly
descriptions: From its eyes, it can expel excess moisture from its body. This liquid is similar in composition to human sweat.
In order to adjust the level of fluids in its body, it exudes water from its eyes. This makes it appear to be crying.

abilities.name: Rock Head
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

name: Mime
descriptions: It looks for a Mr. Rime that’s a good dancer and carefully copies the Mr. Rime’s steps like an apprentice.
It mimics everyone it sees, but it puts extra effort into copying the graceful dance steps of Mr. Rime as practice.

abilities.name: Soundproof
abilities.description: Soundproofing gives the Pokémon full immunity to all sound-based moves.

name: Happiny
descriptions: It carefully carries a round, white rock that it thinks is an egg. It’s bothered by how curly its hair looks.
It carries a round, white rock in its belly pouch. If it gets along well with someone, it will sometimes give that person the rock.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.description: The Pokémon’s status conditions are cured when it switches out.

name: Chatot
descriptions: It can learn and speak human words. If they gather, they all learn the same saying.
It mimics the cries of other Pokémon to trick them into thinking it’s one of them. This way they won’t attack it.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: The Pokémon’s keen eyes prevent its accuracy from being lowered.

name: Spiritomb
descriptions: It was formed by uniting 108 spirits. It has been bound to the Odd Keystone to keep it from doing any mischief.
Its constant mischief and misdeeds resulted in it being bound to an Odd Keystone by a mysterious spell.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: Puts other Pokémon under pressure, causing them to expend more PP to use their moves.

name: Gible
descriptions: It nests in horizontal holes warmed by geothermal heat. Foes who get too close can expect to be pounced on and bitten.
It skulks in caves, and when prey or an enemy passes by, it leaps out and chomps them. The force of its attack sometimes chips its teeth.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s evasiveness in a sandstorm.

name: Gabite
descriptions: It loves sparkly things. It seeks treasures in caves and hoards the loot in its nest.
In rare cases, it molts and sheds its scales. Medicine containing its scales as an ingredient will make a weary body feel invigorated.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s evasiveness in a sandstorm.

name: Garchomp
descriptions: The protuberances on its head serve as sensors. It can even detect distant prey.
It is said that when one runs at high speed, its wings create blades of wind that can fell nearby trees.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s evasiveness in a sandstorm.

name: Mega Garchomp
descriptions: Its disposition is more vicious than before its Mega Evolution. Garchomp carves its opponents up with the scythes on both arms.
Its arms and wings melted into something like scythes. Mad with rage, it rampages on and on.

abilities.name: Sand Force
abilities.description: Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.

name: Munchlax
descriptions: It stores food beneath its fur. It might share just one bite, but only if it really trusts you.
Stuffing itself with vast amounts of food is its only concern. Whether the food is rotten or fresh, yummy or tasteless—it does not care.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.description: The Pokémon may pick up an item another Pokémon used during a battle. It may pick up items outside of battle, too.

name: Riolu
descriptions: It has the peculiar power of being able to see emotions, such as joy and rage, in the form of waves.
They communicate with one another using their auras. They are able to run all through the night.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: The Pokémon’s intense focus prevents it from flinching or being affected by Intimidate.

name: Lucario
descriptions: A well-trained one can use its aura to identify and take in the feelings of creatures over half a mile away.
It’s said that no foe can remain invisible to Lucario, since it can detect auras—even those of foes it could not otherwise see.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: The Pokémon’s intense focus prevents it from flinching or being affected by Intimidate.

name: Mega Lucario
descriptions: Bathed in explosive energy, its combative instincts have awakened. For its enemies, it has no mercy whatsoever.
Its aura has expanded due to Mega Evolution. Governed only by its combative instincts, it strikes enemies without mercy.

abilities.name: Adaptability
abilities.description: Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.

name: Hippopotas
descriptions: It shrouds itself in sand to ward off germs. It travels easily through the sands of the desert.
It shuts its nostrils tight, then travels through sand as if walking. They form colonies of around 10.

abilities.name: Sand Stream
abilities.description: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm when it enters a battle.

name: Hippowdon
descriptions: It brandishes its gaping mouth in a display of fearsome strength. It raises vast quantities of sand while attacking.
It is surprisingly quick to anger. It holds its mouth agape as a display of its strength.

abilities.name: Sand Stream
abilities.description: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm when it enters a battle.

name: Skorupi
descriptions: It attacks using the claws on its tail. Once locked in its grip, its prey is unable to move as this Pokémon’s poison seeps in.
After burrowing into the sand, it waits patiently for prey to come near. This Pokémon and Sizzlipede share common descent.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.description: If the Pokémon’s attack lands a critical hit, the attack is powered up even further.

name: Drapion
descriptions: It’s so vicious that it’s called the Sand Demon. Yet when confronted by Hippowdon, Drapion keeps a low profile and will never pick a fight.
Its poison is potent, but it rarely sees use. This Pokémon prefers to use physical force instead, going on rampages with its car-crushing strength.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.description: If the Pokémon’s attack lands a critical hit, the attack is powered up even further.

name: Croagunk
descriptions: It rarely fights fairly, but that is strictly to ensure survival. It is popular as a mascot.
Inflating its poison sacs, it fills the area with an odd sound and hits flinching opponents with a poison jab.

abilities.name: Dry Skin
abilities.description: Restores the Pokémon’s HP in rain or when it is hit by Water-type moves. Reduces HP in harsh sunlight, and increases the damage received from Fire-type moves.

name: Toxicroak
descriptions: It has a poison sac at its throat. When it croaks, the stored poison is churned for greater potency.
Swaying and dodging the attacks of its foes, it weaves its flexible body in close, then lunges out with its poisonous claws.

abilities.name: Dry Skin
abilities.description: Restores the Pokémon’s HP in rain or when it is hit by Water-type moves. Reduces HP in harsh sunlight, and increases the damage received from Fire-type moves.

name: Carnivine
descriptions: It binds itself to trees in marshes. It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling drool and gulps them down.
It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Finneon
descriptions: It absorbs sunlight with the pink areas of its skin, which then shine. This appears to be a form of camouflage.
The line running down its side can store sunlight. It shines vividly at night.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in rain.

name: Lumineon
descriptions: Lumineon swimming in the darkness of the deep sea look like stars shining in the night sky.
With its shining light, it lures its prey close. However, the light also happens to attract ferocious fish Pokémon—its natural predators.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in rain.

name: Mantyke
descriptions: It swims along with a school of Remoraid, and they’ll all fight together to repel attackers.
Mantyke living in Galar seem to be somewhat sluggish. The colder waters of the seas in this region may be the cause.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: If hit by a Water-type move, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.

name: Snover
descriptions: Seemingly curious about people, they gather around footsteps they find on snowy mountains.
During cold seasons, it migrates to the mountain’s lower reaches. It returns to the snow-covered summit in the spring.

abilities.name: Snow Warning
abilities.description: The Pokémon makes it snow when it enters a battle.

name: Abomasnow
descriptions: They appear when the snow flowers bloom. When the petals fall, they retreat to places unknown again.
It lives a quiet life on mountains that are perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself by whipping up blizzards.

abilities.name: Snow Warning
abilities.description: The Pokémon makes it snow when it enters a battle.

name: Mega Abomasnow
descriptions: It lives a quiet life on mountains that are perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself by whipping up blizzards.
It blankets wide areas in snow by whipping up blizzards. It is also known as “The Ice Monster.”

abilities.name: Snow Warning
abilities.description: The Pokémon makes it snow when it enters a battle.

name: Weavile
descriptions: They travel in groups of four or five, leaving signs for one another on trees and rocks. They bring down their prey with coordinated attacks.
Evolution made it even more devious. It communicates by clawing signs in boulders.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: Puts other Pokémon under pressure, causing them to expend more PP to use their moves.

name: Magnezone
descriptions: Exposure to a special magnetic field changed Magneton’s molecular structure, turning it into Magnezone.
As it zooms through the sky, this Pokémon seems to be receiving signals of unknown origin while transmitting signals of unknown purpose.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.description: The Pokémon cannot be knocked out by a single hit as long as its HP is full. One-hit KO moves will also fail to knock it out.

name: Lickilicky
descriptions: Lickilicky can do just about anything with its tongue, which is as dexterous as the human hand. In contrast, Lickilicky’s use of its fingers is clumsy.
Lickilicky’s strange tongue can stretch to many times the length of its body. No one has figured out how Lickilicky’s tongue can stretch so far.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: The Pokémon is oblivious, keeping it from being infatuated, falling for taunts, or being affected by Intimidate.

name: Rhyperior
descriptions: It relies on its carapace to deflect incoming attacks and throw its enemy off balance. As soon as that happens, it drives its drill into the foe.
It can load up to three projectiles per arm into the holes in its hands. What launches out of those holes could be either rocks or Roggenrola.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.description: The Pokémon draws in all Electric-type moves. Instead of taking damage from them, its Sp. Atk stat is boosted.

name: Tangrowth
descriptions: Vine growth is accelerated for Tangrowth living in warm climates. If the vines grow long, Tangrowth shortens them by tearing parts of them off.
Tangrowth has two arms that it can extend as it pleases. Recent research has shown that these arms are, in fact, bundles of vines.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in harsh sunlight.

name: Electivire
descriptions: In terms of electrical-energy output, Electivire is one of the best among all Electric Pokémon. It discharges high-voltage currents from its tails.
The amount of electrical energy this Pokémon produces is proportional to the rate of its pulse. The voltage jumps while Electivire is battling.

abilities.name: Motor Drive
abilities.description: The Pokémon takes no damage when hit by Electric-type moves. Instead, its Speed stat is boosted.

name: Magmortar
descriptions: Living in the crater of a volcano has caused this Pokémon’s body to resemble its environment— it has an organ similar to a magma chamber.
When Magmortar inhales deeply, the fire burning in its belly intensifies, rising in temperature to over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

name: Togekiss
descriptions: Known as a bringer of blessings, it’s been depicted on good-luck charms since ancient times.
These Pokémon are never seen anywhere near conflict or turmoil. In recent times, they’ve hardly been seen at all.

abilities.name: Serene Grace
abilities.description: Raises the likelihood of additional effects occurring when the Pokémon uses its moves.

name: Yanmega
descriptions: This six-legged Pokémon is easily capable of transporting an adult in flight. The wings on its tail help it stay balanced.
It prefers to battle by biting apart foes’ heads instantly while flying by at high speed.

abilities.name: Tinted Lens
abilities.description: The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves to deal regular damage.

name: Leafeon
descriptions: The younger they are, the more they smell like fresh grass. With age, their fragrance takes on the odor of fallen leaves.
When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch of sunshine, you’ll know it is using photosynthesis to produce clean air.

abilities.name: Leaf Guard
abilities.description: Prevents status conditions in harsh sunlight.

name: Glaceon
descriptions: It lowers its body heat to freeze its fur. The hairs then become like needles it can fire.
It can control its body temperature at will. This enables it to freeze the moisture in the atmosphere, creating flurries of diamond dust.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s evasiveness in snow.

name: Gliscor
descriptions: Its flight is soundless. It uses its lengthy tail to carry off its prey... Then its elongated fangs do the rest.
It observes prey while hanging inverted from branches. When the chance presents itself, it swoops!

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s evasiveness in a sandstorm.

name: Mamoswine
descriptions: It looks strong, and that’s exactly what it is. As the weather grows colder, its ice tusks grow longer, thicker, and more impressive.
This Pokémon can be spotted in wall paintings from as far back as 10,000 years ago. For a while, it was thought to have gone extinct.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: The Pokémon is oblivious, keeping it from being infatuated, falling for taunts, or being affected by Intimidate.

name: Porygon-Z
descriptions: Some say an additional program made this Pokémon evolve, but even academics can’t agree on whether Porygon-Z is really an evolution.
Porygon-Z had a program installed to allow it to move between dimensions, but the program also caused instability in Porygon-Z’s behavior.

abilities.name: Adaptability
abilities.description: Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.

name: Gallade
descriptions: Because it can sense what its foe is thinking, its attacks burst out first, fast, and fierce.
When trying to protect someone, it extends its elbows as if they were swords and fights savagely.

abilities.name: Steadfast
abilities.description: The Pokémon’s determination boosts its Speed stat every time it flinches.

name: Mega Gallade
descriptions: A master of courtesy and swordsmanship, it fights using extending swords on its elbows.
Because it can sense what its foe is thinking, its attacks burst out first, fast, and fierce.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: The Pokémon’s intense focus prevents it from flinching or being affected by Intimidate.

name: Probopass
descriptions: It uses three small units to catch prey and battle enemies. The main body mostly just gives orders.
Although it can control its units known as Mini-Noses, they sometimes get lost and don’t come back.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.description: The Pokémon cannot be knocked out by a single hit as long as its HP is full. One-hit KO moves will also fail to knock it out.

name: Dusknoir
descriptions: With the mouth on its belly, Dusknoir swallows its target whole. The soul is the only thing eaten—Dusknoir disgorges the body before departing.
At the bidding of transmissions from the spirit world, it steals people and Pokémon away. No one knows whether it has a will of its own.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: Puts other Pokémon under pressure, causing them to expend more PP to use their moves.

name: Froslass
descriptions: It freezes prey by blowing its −58 degree Fahrenheit breath. It is said to then secretly display its prey.
When it finds humans or Pokémon it likes, it freezes them and takes them to its chilly den, where they become decorations.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s evasiveness in snow.

name: Rotom
descriptions: Research continues on this Pokémon, which could be the power source of a unique motor.
Its electricity-like body can enter some kinds of machines and take control in order to make mischief.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Heat Rotom
descriptions: This Rotom has possessed a convection microwave oven. It will sear the surrounding area with its burning heat, then smile in delight.
If the convection microwave oven is not working properly, then the Rotom inhabiting it will become lethargic.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Wash Rotom
descriptions: The model of washing machine that Rotom can inspirit has been discontinued, so these appliances are now traded at high prices.
This Rotom has entered a washing machine. It nods with satisfaction after it floods the surrounding area.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Frost Rotom
descriptions: The special motor within the refrigerator is the key to bringing about Rotom’s change in form.
This Rotom has entered a refrigerator. It leaps around gleefully after it uses cold air to freeze the area around it.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Fan Rotom
descriptions: There are several appliances that Rotom can inspirit, but the first one to be developed was the electric fan.
This Rotom has entered an electric fan. It smirks with satisfaction over a prank well pulled after it blows away everything around it.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Mow Rotom
descriptions: This Rotom has possessed a lawn mower. It will mow down grass and flowers, then swagger around with pride at its accomplishments.
The lawn mower is one of the household appliances that led to the development of the Rotom Dex.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Uxie
descriptions: It is said that its emergence gave humans the intelligence to improve their quality of life.
Known as “The Being of Knowledge.” It is said that it can wipe out the memory of those who see its eyes.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Mesprit
descriptions: It sleeps at the bottom of a lake. Its spirit is said to leave its body to fly on the lake’s surface.
Known as “The Being of Emotion.” It taught humans the nobility of sorrow, pain, and joy.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Azelf
descriptions: It is thought that Uxie, Mesprit, and Azelf all came from the same egg.
Known as “The Being of Willpower.” It sleeps at the bottom of a lake to keep the world in balance.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Dialga
descriptions: This Pokémon is spoken of in legend. It is said that time began moving when Dialga was born.
It has the power to control time. It appears in Sinnoh-region myths as an ancient deity.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: Puts other Pokémon under pressure, causing them to expend more PP to use their moves.

name: Origin Forme Dialga
descriptions: Radiant light caused Dialga to take on a form bearing a striking resemblance to the creator Pokémon. Dialga now wields such colossal strength that one must conclude this is its true form.
Radiant light caused Dialga to take on a form bearing a striking resemblance to the creator Pokémon. Dialga now wields such colossal strength that one must conclude this is its true form.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: Puts other Pokémon under pressure, causing them to expend more PP to use their moves.

name: Palkia
descriptions: It is said to live in a gap in the spatial dimension parallel to ours. Palkia appears in mythology.
It has the ability to distort space. It is described as a deity in Sinnoh-region mythology.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: Puts other Pokémon under pressure, causing them to expend more PP to use their moves.

name: Origin Forme Palkia
descriptions: It soars across the sky in a form that greatly resembles the creator of all things. Perhaps this imitation of appearance is Palkia’s strategy for gaining Arceus’s powers.
It soars across the sky in a form that greatly resembles the creator of all things. Perhaps this imitation of appearance is Palkia’s strategy for gaining Arceus’s powers.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: Puts other Pokémon under pressure, causing them to expend more PP to use their moves.

name: Heatran
descriptions: Boiling blood, like magma, circulates through its body. It makes its dwelling place in volcanic caves.
It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: If hit by a Fire-type move, the Pokémon absorbs the flames and uses them to power up its own Fire-type moves.

name: Regigigas
descriptions: There is an enduring legend that states this Pokémon towed continents with ropes.
It is said to have made Pokémon that look like itself from a special ice mountain, rocks, and magma.

abilities.name: Slow Start
abilities.description: For five turns, the Pokémon’s Attack and Speed stats are halved.

name: Altered Forme
descriptions: It was banished for its violence. It silently gazed upon the old world from the Distortion World.
This Pokémon is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours, where common knowledge is distorted and strange.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: Puts other Pokémon under pressure, causing them to expend more PP to use their moves.

name: Origin Forme
descriptions: It was banished for its violence. It silently gazed upon the old world from the Distortion World.
This Pokémon is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours, where common knowledge is distorted and strange.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Cresselia
descriptions: When it flies, it releases shiny particles from its veil-like wings. It is said to represent the crescent moon.
When it flies, it releases shiny particles from its veil-like wings. It is said to represent the crescent moon.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Phione
descriptions: It drifts in warm seas. It always returns to where it was born, no matter how far it may have drifted.
When the water warms, they inflate the flotation sac on their heads and drift languidly on the sea in packs.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.description: Cures the Pokémon’s status conditions in rain.

name: Manaphy
descriptions: It starts its life with a wondrous power that permits it to bond with any kind of Pokémon.
It is born with a wondrous power that lets it bond with any kind of Pokémon.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.description: Cures the Pokémon’s status conditions in rain.

name: Darkrai
descriptions: It can lull people to sleep and make them dream. It is active during nights of the new moon.
It chases people and Pokémon from its territory by causing them to experience deep, nightmarish slumbers.

abilities.name: Bad Dreams
abilities.description: Damages opposing Pokémon that are asleep.

name: Land Forme
descriptions: The blooming of Gracidea flowers confers the power of flight upon it. Feelings of gratitude are the message it delivers.
It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantly transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.description: The Pokémon’s status conditions are cured when it switches out.

name: Sky Forme
descriptions: The blooming of Gracidea flowers confers the power of flight upon it. Feelings of gratitude are the message it delivers.
It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantly transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.

abilities.name: Serene Grace
abilities.description: Raises the likelihood of additional effects occurring when the Pokémon uses its moves.

name: Arceus
descriptions: It is told in mythology that this Pokémon was born before the universe even existed.
According to the legends of Sinnoh, this Pokémon emerged from an egg and shaped all there is in this world.

abilities.name: Multitype
abilities.description: Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the plate it holds.

name: Victini
descriptions: When it shares the infinite energy it creates, that being’s entire body will be overflowing with power.
This Pokémon brings victory. It is said that Trainers with Victini always win, regardless of the type of encounter.

abilities.name: Victory Star
abilities.description: Boosts the accuracy of the Pokémon and its allies.

name: Snivy
descriptions: They photosynthesize by bathing their tails in sunlight. When they are not feeling well, their tails droop.
Being exposed to sunlight makes its movements swifter. It uses vines more adeptly than its hands.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.description: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

name: Servine
